question: The Central Government has approved the construction of over 1.68 lakh houses under which scheme?
option4: Deendayal Antyodaya Yojana National Urban Livelihoods Mission.
explanation:
The Indian Government has approved the construction of over 1.68 lakh houses in urban areas under the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana- Urban.
As per the Union Housing and Urban Affairs Ministry, the total number of houses sanctioned so far stands at 1.1 crore. Under PMAY-U, 41 lakh houses have been completed so far and over 70 lakh houses are under construction.
